Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: aur jahaan chaahenge baha le jaenge
ye vah log hain jo nazaren pooree karate hain aur us din se jinakee sakhtee har tarah phailee hogee darate hain
aur usakee mohabbat mein mohataaj aur yateem aur aseer ko khaana khilaate hain
(aur kahate hain ki) ham to tumako bas khaalis khuda ke lie khilaate hain ham na tum se badale ke khaastagaar hain aur na shukr guzaaree ke
hamako to apane paravaradigaar se us din ka dar hai jisamen munh ban jaenge (aur) chehare par havaiyaan udatee hongee
to khuda unhen us din kee takaleef se bacha lega aur unako taazagee aur khushadilee ata pharamaega
aur unake sabr ke badale (behisht ke) baag aur resham (kee poshaak) ata faramaega
vahaan vah takhton par takie lagae (baithe) honge na vahaan (aaphataab kee) dhoop dekhenge aur na shiddat kee sardee
aur ghane darakhton ke sae un par jhuke hue honge aur mevon ke guchchhe unake bahut qareeb har tarah unake ekhteyaar mein
aur unake saamane chaandee ke saagar aur sheeshe ke nihaayat shaphfaaf gilaas ka daur chal raha hoga
aur sheeshe bhee (kaanch ke nahin) chaandee ke jo theek andaaze ke mutaabik banae gae hain
aur vahaan unhen aisee sharaab pilaee jaegee jisamen janajabeel (ke paanee) kee aamezish hogee
ye behasht mein ek chashma hai jisaka naam salasabeel hai
aur unake saamane hamesha ek haalat par rahane vaale naujavaal ladake chakkar lagaate honge ki jab tum unako dekho to samajho ki bikhare hue motee hain
aur jab tum vahaan nigaah uthaoge to har tarah kee neamat aur azeemush shaan saltanat dekhoge
unake oopar sabz kreb aur atalas kee poshaak hogee aur unhen chaandee ke kangan pahanae jaenge aur unaka paravaradigaar unhen nihaayat paakeeza sharaab pilaega
ye yaqeenee tumhaare lie hoga aur tumhaaree (kaaraguzaariyon ke) sile mein aur tumhaaree koshish qaabile shukr guzaaree hai
(ai rasool) hamane tum par quraan ko raphta raphta karake naazil kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke hukm ke intazaar mein sabr kie raho aur un logon mein se gunaahagaar aur naashukre kee pairavee na karana
subah shaam apane paravaradigaar ka naam lete raho
